DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bempedoic acid ( ETC-1002 ) added-on ezetimibe therapy effective safe versus placebo patient elevate LDL cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Bempedoic Acid ( ETC-1002 ) Add-on Ezetimibe Therapy Patients With Elevated LDL-C ( CLEAR Tranquility )
DOC.criteria: Fasting LDLcholesterol great equal 100 mg/dL screen Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman Use stable lipidmodifying therapy least 4 week prior screen include ezetimibe 10mg daily Fasting blood triglyceride great equal 500 mg/dL Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great equal 50 kg/m2 Recent history clinically significant cardiovascular disease Use statin therapy dose great define `` lowdose '' within 4 week prior screen ; `` lowdose '' define average daily dose rosuvastatin 5 mg , atorvastatin 10 mg , simvastatin 10 mg , lovastatin 20 mg , pravastatin 40 mg , fluvastatin 40 mg , pitavastatin 2 mg .
